reviews.sentence: Just great. Very comfortable hotel. Rooms are spacious and the bed was really good. Facilities are fine the pool area was clean and nice and the gym was also good they are now renovating it. Breakfast was really good and they changed the menu every day. Room service was also good. The staff was very friendly and helpful. They made our stay extremely nice. I will come back for sure.

Loved it. It was lovely and warm in Phoenix and a perfect day for lounging by the pool. The breakfast is great and the hotel has a certain peace and calm about it which I loved. The room was spacious and clean. There was a lady waiting on us in the restaurant who was very polite and sweet and stayed on for us even though we were dreadfully late for breakfast. Will stay again.

DISAPOINTING. Not sure how they are able to hang a Radison sign on this place. Very little about this hotel will remind you of a Radison Hotel. MANY renovations are necessary here. It would appear that ownership sucks this place dry. There needs to be an injection of cash into this place. The carpeting in my room as well as the hallways was very stained and quite nasty looking. Just a very outdated rundown hotel. The topper to this stay was the breakfast. The same breakfast that is included in MANY of the hotels that I stay in include this same breakfast at no additional charge. This place will charge you around 1250. Better off spending the 1250 for a real breakfast down the road. Would not recommend this place to anyone unles there were no other vacancies with in 50 miles.

Great location. Great breakfast buffet. Friendly staff Cici was fabulousSad the tiny bar did not open until 430pm. screwups and mimosas go great with breakfast bufetsGreat location in the area. next to malls. close to the airport and near Rawhide.

Great stay at the Radison Very friendly staff. Nice clean room. My only negative comment is that the lobby breakfast area should have a sign posted stating that the breakfast is not free. I looked back at the booking information and sure enough it says the breakfast will cost 1295. The last time I looked at that was one month before we arrived so I forgot about having to pay for breakfast. That was my fault. But the way it is set up it looks to be just like every other free continental breakfast. Jonathan the breakfast attendant was superb. Very friendly. I did not want to eat much but you bet I did once I found out I was paying 1295. Convenient. A sign stating breakfast is not free.

Hidden Gem in Chandler. I visit Chandler frequently for business meetings. I discovered this Hotel since my regular hotel was booked. Not staying any place else now. Absolutely loved everything about this place. Quality room great breakfast awesome facilities. Amazing staff. Will love to visit again soon.

The gym was good and so was the pool. The beds are not very comfortable. Atleast the ones my wife and I used. Not a fan of the sleep numbers. It would also be nice if there was a little fridge in the room. Especially because its Arizona and hot. And what ever happened to free breakfast.

My Stay in Hotel Radison Chandler. We stayed recently for week in Radison. We felt that this Hotel needs to improve a lot in many areas. For example when we got the quotation we got it with Breakfast but during Check in the hotel guy said that there was no Breakfast included in the tariff. We had to show them our booking and get the Breakfast coupons. I placed the breakfast coupons in my room near the TV. Seemingly the Housekeeping staff threw them considering as trash. I explained this to the Hotel Front Desk and asked them to give me the duplicate breakfast coupons. They said they will give but did not give them. Rather I was expected to explain this daily during the Breakfast time and take the breakfast. First of all the Housekeeping people should be able to recognize the coupons and should not throw them. Next when I explained this to the Front Desk people they should give me the coupons without any hesitations. Here they promised to give but acted as if they forgot to give. Coming to the food the breakfast was very limited in options. The Supposed to be fresh fruit was never fresh. We felt that the fruit was always a stale fruit. Also the muffins and cakes they had were seemingly not that fresh. They keep Fried Potato but sometimes they mix it with some kind of meat so one has to be very careful before taking Potato if he. she is a pure vegetarian. Only thing I liked about this hotel is their Shuttle Drop and Pickup service. So if anyone asks me if go there any time again I will say No.

Central location great value hotel. Centrally located close the Arizona Mills Phoenix Premium Outlets Walmart In N Out etc. Hotel is by the highway but you could not hear the noise from our room. Hotel has a nice pool and hot tub. Hot breakfast was included with our room rate and consisted of eggs sausages bacon and a wide array of baked goods fresh fruits and pastries. Room was spacious enough and clean. Bed firmness is controlled by a remote control that was a big plus for usHotel had coin operated laundry facilities on site as well as an ATM plus ice making machines on every floor. If there is one thing I do not like about this hotel is the fact that the rooms do not have a fridge. What hotel does not have at least a bar fridgeOveral a great value for the money and we enjoyed our stay at this hotel. I would recommend this to my family and friends.

Hotel right off Hwy 10. Hotel is located close to shopping and golf courses. Morning breakfast had a good selection and was a good deal at 10 dayHotel staff were very friendly and helpfulRoms were not very sound proof could hear guests in rooms above walking around. Also could hear guest talking around the pool until it closed at 100 pm. Location.
I stayed in this hotel for 2 nights. The hotel was above average with super comfy beds and pillows. A car rental is a must. Downtown Chandler offers better restaurants.

Fooled by ratings. beware. I was n’t expecting anything but average but this place is below average. I was fooled by the ratings. The carpets walls upholstered furniture is stained dirty and pretty much disgusting. Like think twice before bare feet or sitting in anything but the bed. It ’s like this was the party hotel where the management stopped doing a good cleaning and maintaining. Stuff spilled and never cleaned. Broken and never fixed. Rumor is a multi million dollar renovation is planned and there is no doubt this is a realistic need. Our group was told all the rooms are pretty much same condition and we see it in ours. The bed is very clean comfortable and the only reason to stay. The bathroom while worn is clean and functional. Water pressure is great towels are good. Thank goodness because not sure there would be another hotel with rooms in this rate range. The staff are friendly and responsive. The lobby breakfast restaurant is adequate. Not sure if the bar is ever open which is a pet peeve of mine hotels who say they have one but come to find out it ’s closed and there is n’t one to walk to. Beware. All I can say.

Very nice visit. The facility is nice. well maintained. The room was clean well stocked and the bed was comfy. Lots of parking. There is a bar lounge area. The staff were OUTSTANDING. We could not have asked for a more accommodating staff. Great job and looking forward to returning.

This property is advertised as having breakfast and having a restaurant. The restaurant is for breakfast only. The front desk advised if occupancy is lower than average they do not open the restaurant. This would have been good to know before booking at this location. Not only was there no restaurant open when i arrived at 7 pm but no breakfast was served while I was there.
Loved it. Was a great place to stay comfy beds great area staff friendly. Breakfast was delicious but I wish it was complimentary.

When good is not good enough. My hubby stepped on a screw that had been left on the floor by the bed. There were not enough towles in the room despite us notifying there would be 4 adults. They tried to charge us for breakfast when all we wanted was commentary coffee.

I chose to stay here due to some friends who had flown in from out of state were staying here. The only request that I made was to be able to check in before 4 pm and I never heard back from anyone. I never asked about parking at no additional cost. I believe that there should have been some signage or the staff in the Breakfast Buffet area should have mentioned that eggs could have been made to order.

New Hotel Doubletree. Great new hotel right off I10. Always stayed in this area and was curious about the new Hilton property I was very pleasantly surprised with this hotel. Great location for me I was upgraded to a 2 room suite. The hotel was very well run and I enjoyed my stay nice restaurant with a full breakfast and dinner menu. Large bar if you are interested I will stay here again as long as the price is reasonable which it was.

Excellent and Quiet. Stayed here on business and this hotel is clean fresh and extremely quiet. My first two nights I thought I was the only guest staying here it was so quiet. Love the huge TVs alsoBreakfast was great and included as I am a Gold member. A few suggestions for breakfast. Skip the wateful individual ketchup bottles. None of us are millionaires or NFL team owners who need this. I spent half my breakfast trying to get the seal off. And while you have two urns of regular coffee why not one for decaf. Weird I had to ask and wait for a decaf. Again loved this hotel and will be back when in the area.

Adequate Doubletree. Staff was friendly. Room and bathroom were fine. Breakfast was more limited for those who do n’t want hot. One flavor of yogurt. parfait is more environmentally friendly for less plastic but not great for those of us who want more choices like plain no fruit or build your own.
I wish they would have complimentary breakfast other than that I had a great stay suite was a bit smaller than expected but I could manage.

Nice and new. The hotel was large and airy with a modern flair. The young lady at the front desk was helpful and welcoming. The rooms were sparkling clean and good sized. Thank goodness no barn doors on the bathroom for this renovation. We were cozy and comfortable in our room. Breakfast left a lot to be desired though. The nice lady at the counter seem a little flustered when I asked where the hot tea was. She brought me out some hot water and tea bags but all the tea on hand was herbal no breakfast tea. The bread choices were sparse and fairly unappealing. The fruit mix looked like it had sat out overnight. In short a nice new clean hotel with comfortable rooms but I recommend heading to a First Watch or Cracker Barrel for breakfast.

Nice and new. The hotel was large and airy with a modern flair. The young lady at the front desk was helpful and welcoming. The rooms were sparkling clean and good sized. Thank goodness no barn doors on the bathroom for this renovation. We were cozy and comfortable in our room. Breakfast left a lot to be desired though. The nice lady at the counter seem a little flustered when I asked where the hot tea was. She brought me out some hot water and tea bags but all the tea on hand was herbal no breakfast tea. The bread choices were sparse and fairly unappealing. The fruit mix looked like it had sat out overnight. In short a nice new clean hotel with comfortable rooms but I recommend heading to a First Watch or Cracker Barrel for breakfast.

This hotel is amazing. This hotel was fantastic. The rooms and the common areas were immaculately clean. The hotel indoor and outdoor areas were beautifully and well designed. The hotel staff specifically Jef Jenifer and Tori were accommodating welcoming friendly and helpful. Everything we needed they were happy to assist with from early check in to late checkout. We ordered breakfast to the room during our stay. The food was delivered right on time and it was hot and delicious. We arrived after a very stressful situation at another hotel. We were immediately welcomed and they opened the bar early in order to pour us a glass of wine and help us wind down. I would most highly recommend this hotel if you are looking for a place to stay anywhere in the Chandler AZ area. This is the best and most relaxing hotel stay I have ever had.
